properties.description: Dataset contents: The GlaMBIE dataset contains both the input data and the results to the exercise./n/nThe datasets are organised in the two main data folders, each with a more detailed data information file, and with subfolders containing the data in csv files./n/nCitation: The GlaMBIE Team (2024): Glacier Mass Balance Intercomparison Exercise (GlaMBIE) Dataset 1.0.0. World Glacier Monitoring Service (WGMS), Zurich, Switzerland. https://doi.org/10.5904/wgms-glambie-2024-07

links.title: Glacier Mass Balance Intercomparison Exercise (GlaMBIE) Dataset
